Save your bookmarks directly from your web browser, privately and encrypted for only 1 cent each! 

Bookmarks are stored encrypted on the blockchain, immutably so you never lose your data. Windbell does not track what you are storing, giving users full control and confidence to store, browse and enjoy content at their own pace.
